description:
Takumi soon discovers Natsuki’s secret, leading him to vent his anger in an egotistic battle against Kyoichi at Akagi. Takumi disregards his disadvantages in the race and suffers the consequences of his carelessness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ACT.5 破滅へのカウントダウン
Compte à rebours vers la défaite
